title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 204.6 - Decision and recommended order by administrative law judge
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 204.6 - Decision and recommended order by administrative law judge

State Regulations

Upon closure of the record before an administrative law judge
designated by the director, the administrative law judge shall issue a decision
and recommended order and submit the record of the case to the
board. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
204.6

Amended

New

York State Register August 2, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 31, eff. 8/2/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
